info.name: ArangoDB
info.description:
## 20240209 (JO)

- Updated collection to limit configuration to rule 901 only (based on access to public-only repositories by default)
- Updated {{arangourl}} to {{arangoUrl}}/ in all test paths to match current environment file variable used for QA testing
- Created a new Tazama-LOCAL environment file based on more complete QA environment files
    
- Renamed ArangoDB to 1-ArangoDB-setup
    
- Moved indexes to a separate folder: 2-Create-Indexes
    
- Moved config POSTs to a new folder: 3-ArangoDB-Default-Config
    
- Moved "tests" to a separate folder: 4-ArangoDB-Setup-Tests
    
- Updated existing Indexes folder name to 5-Fetch-Indexes
    
- TO DO: update indexes to reflect current benchmark indexes
- TO DO: scrub configuration of redundant databases and collections and test impact

item.name: 5-Fetch-Indexes
item.description:
The "Create All Indexes" requests has a JSON representation of all the indexes this request will create.

If you wish to modify the indexes to be created, all the GET requests can be used to generate a JSON string of all the indexes on a "Source" system.
